channel.title: Lava water help please
channel.description: Hello, Dose anyway know how to change the water in a client from lava to just blue water? I got a delta client not a PI... Thanks! ;)

item.title: Lava water help please
item.dc:creator: @smeego smeego
item.description:
@smeego wrote:

Client sided

go to class30_sub2_sub1_sub3

and search for:

public static final int[] method371(int i)

under the last {
DELETE
Quote
if (i == 1) {
i = 40;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Lava water help please
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Both of you, stop fighting. It’s at least one of those. It could be done in the cache, on the fly, or both.

Read full topic

item.title: Lava water help please
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:5, topic:428744”][quote author=Travas link=topic=531436.msg3882828#msg3882828 date=1326171825]

Change the textures in the cache, use Tom’s cache editor.
[/quote]No.

It helps quite a bit if you actually use the search bar, OP.

Here is the thread that has the problem solved, you just need to follow it backwards since your changing lava to water: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=446174.0

No. Actually, there’s a large possibility that the lava was modified using the cache.[/quote]Actually, 99% of Moparscape doesn’t know what a cache is, let alone how to change the water texture

Read full topic

item.title: Lava water help please
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:4, topic:428744”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=531436.msg3882822#msg3882822 date=1326171191]
Change the textures in the cache, use Tom’s cache editor.
[/quote]No.

It helps quite a bit if you actually use the search bar, OP.

Here is the thread that has the problem solved, you just need to follow it backwards since your changing lava to water: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=446174.0[/quote]

No. Actually, there’s a large possibility that the lava was modified using the cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Lava water help please
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

LynxCore2:

Hello, Dose anyway know how to change the water in a client from lava to just blue water? I got a delta client not a PI… Thanks!

More than likely it’s being overwritten on the fly.

if (texture == water) {
    texture = lava;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Lava water help please

item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Change the textures in the cache, use Tom’s cache editor.
